entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 07:52 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle early this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4 except minus 1 along parts of the coast.
